languages.title: Chirurgia traumatică și cronică a membrelor
activities: - excizia formațiunilor tumorale cutanate (nevi pigmentari, papiloame, carcinoame, melanom etc.), părților moi (chiste sinoviale, lipoame, fibrome, sarcoame etc)

- chirurgia nervilor periferici: sindroame compresive - sindrom de canal carpian, Guyon, cubital, tarsian, peronier etc; reconstrucția nervilor periferici - neurolize, grefe si transferuri nervoase; tumori nervoase
- chirurgia tendoanelor și oaselor: tenorafii, grefe tendinoase, transferuri tendinoase, fracturi falange si metacarpiene, tumori osoase la nivelul degetelor
- mână reumatismală, spastică, sechelară

languages.title: Traumatic and chronic limb surgery
activities: - Excision of cutaneous tumor formations (pigmentary nevi, papilomas, carcinomas, melanoma, etc.), soft parts (synovial cysts, lipids, fibrome, sarcomas, etc.)
- Peripheral nerve surgery: Compressive syndromes - Carpal, Guyon, Cubital, Tarsian, Peronier, etc; Peripheral nerve reconstruction - neurolyises, grafts and nerve transfers; nerve tumors
- Surgery of tendons and bones: tenorages, tending grafts, tendonous transfers, phalange fractures and metacaries, bone tumors in fingers
- Rheumatic, spastic, seizure

languages.title: Chirurgie plastică generală
activities: - excizia formațiunilor tumorale cutanate și de părți moi (chiste sebacee, lipoame, sarcoame etc.)
- excizia cicatricilor
- tratamentul piciorului diabetic și a escarelor
- acoperirea defectelor folosind o gamă largă de procedee: grefe de piele, lambouri locale/regionale/liber transferate
- tratamentul arsurilor: acut și sechele

languages.title: General plastic surgery
activities: - the excision of cutaneous tumor formations and soft parts (chiste sebaceous, lipids, sarcomas, etc.)
- scar excision
- Treatment of diabetic foot and esters
- Coverage of defects using a wide range of processes: leather grafts, local / regional / free transferred lambs
- Treatment of burns: acute and sequelae

languages.title: Chirurgie estetică
activities: - chirurgia sânilor
- chirurgia remodelării corporale
- față: blefaroplastie, urechi decolate

languages.title: Aesthetic surgery
activities: - Breast surgery
- Body remodeling surgery
- Front: Blepharoplasty, ears taken

languages.title: Terapii nonchirurgicale (anti-ageing)
activities: - microneedling (Dermapen)
- rejuvenare faciala si  tratamentul leziunilor vasculare folosind laserul Fotona SP Dynamics

languages.title: Non-surgical therapies (anti-aging)
activities: - microneedling (Dermapen)
- facial rejuvenation and treatment of vascular lesions using the Fotona SP Dynamics laser
